item.title: Day 4 - Friday Night Fever
item.description: #Drinktober the 4th and I hit the dance floor to show off my moves with this Disco Forklift Truck. (The forklift’s parked outside, obviously)

item.title: Day 3 - Twisted
item.description: For the 3rd of #Drinktober, a poorly executed tribute to the late Keith Flint as I become the twisted FireCatcher!

item.title: FML give me a kebab
item.description: Well today has kicked my arse. I’ve felt absolutely crap all day: not sure if it’s lack of meat or caffeine. Shit day, sat in a meeting until 10.30 surrounded by wine and burgers…. kill me now. I also had my first Ribena. What a load of shit.

item.title: Day 2 - 5 miles off the ground
item.description: When we shoot to kill And you know we always will It’s a bomber! It’s a bomber! A Lancaster bomber - for the 2nd of #Drinktober I’ve got this rather tasty amber ale, even if it is named for the dark lands on the Wrong side of the Pennines…

item.title: Day 1.5 - Meanwhile on Planet Heidi
item.description: kill me now

item.title: Day 1 - Dirt Cheap
item.description: Contracts… Neckties! HIGH VOLTAGE!!! #Drinktober 2019 kicks into action with some Dirty Deeds

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: It’s the 31st of #Drinktober - #Drinkoween! So there was really no other option than to assemble a bunch of my spookiest stuff and finish off the month with the “Unofficial Beer Of Halloween” - Hobgoblin!

item.title: Day 30 - Blue moon
item.description: It’s the 30th of #Drinktober After escaping the Medusa’s petrifying gaze I thought I was safe, until the rising of the Blue Moon unleashed the beast within - transforming me into the dreaded Blue Wolfman!

item.title: Day 29 - Turned to stone
item.description: Disaster strikes for the 29th of #Drinktober - I’ve been turned into stone by the fearsome Medusa! Can I break the spell before the next exciting installment? Tune in tomorrow to find out…

item.title: Day 27 - Pumpking
item.description: A horrifying presence arises for the 27th of #Drinktober - Beware the evil of the Pumpking! [](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10156888807378140&set=p.10156888807378140&type=3&eid=ARAsletlxd27_JxdoXHwrqIPoz3-BI4p-dbupIvrq1DsQcuIZVGGw1Iwb-gRflvtAm0W5X1p1Jc5mdh0)

item.title: Day 28 - Ghost Ship
item.description: Shiver me timbers! Legends tell of a lost pirate vessel, cursed to wander the high seas eternally with her terrifying skeleton crew, only appearing on the 28th of #Drinktober to plunder the booty of the living. Beware the Ghost Ship, me hearties, lest she take ye to Davy Jones’ locker!

item.title: Day 26 - Season of the Witch
item.description: Getting close to Halloween now, so for the rest of #Drinktober I’ll be drinking the spookiest beers I can find, starting with this Blonde Witch :)

item.title: Day 25 - Skål!
item.description: A Viking theme for the 25th of #Drinktober with a mighty horn of Jorvik ale. Skål!

item.title: Day 24 - Up the Irons
item.description: For the 24th of #Drinktober it’s on with the Maiden shirt and up with the horns for a lovely bottle of Trooper \m/

item.title: Day 23 - Urban Fox
item.description: Slept like crap yesterday and I’m absolutely shattered tonight, so no chance of any comical costume shenanigans:( But it’ll take more than that to stop me celebrating the 23rd of #Drinktober with this Urban Fox red ale :)

item.title: Day 22 - Proper Job
item.description: 22nd of #Drinktober - tonight I’m having a Proper Job :)

item.title: Day 21 - Rheinbacher
item.description: Getting a bit more mileage out of my awesome new beer stein for the 21st of #Drinktober with a Rheinbacher Weissbier and a German shirt I borrowed from Vikki

item.title: Day 20 - Yarr!!
item.description: Yarr! Little bit of a nautical theme for the 20th of #Drinktober - Cap’n Jonny’s relaxing after a long day on the high seas with a Shipyard IPA

item.title: Day 19 - Kingfisher
item.description: 19th of #Drinktober and it’s curry night again. This week I’m having a Kingfisher with a lamb naga mirch from the local takeaway :)

item.title: Day 18 - Arise, my mighty pink army!
item.description: It’s the 18th of #Drinktober and I’m having a pint of Joe’s Draft ale before going to see the awesome Evil Scarecrow in York \m/ Crabulon! Crabulon! Crabulon!

item.title: Day 17 - Bees!
item.description: For #Drinktober the 17th I’m having a Queen Bee honey ale. I’d be some kind of body-snatched doppelganger if I didn’t say that it’s the bee’s knees and it’s given me a bit of a buzz :)

item.title: Day 16 - Treacle Treat
item.description: We’re past the halfway mark now on the 16th of #Drinktober, and I’m having a Treacle Treat. Really nice dark ale with a cool skull design, which is always good :) How’s your water/ Heidi? :p

item.title: Day 15 - Felinfoel ESB
item.description: For the 15th of #Drinktober I’m having a Felinfoel ESB, mainly because its got an awesome dragon on the label :)

item.title: Day 14 - Dunkel Fester
item.description: It’s the 14th of #Drinktober and I’ve got a nice bottle of the excellently named Dunkel Fester :D

item.title: Day 13 - Time for pudding
item.description: 13th of #Drinktober - tonight I’m having a Sticky Toffee Pudding Ale. It’s really nice :)

item.title: Day 12 - King Cobra
item.description: 12th of #Drinktober and it’s curry night so I’m having a King Cobra. Hail to the King, baby!

item.title: Day 11 - We are the Road Crew
item.description: 11th of #Drinktober and I’m busting out an old favourite - Motörhead Röad Crew \m/

item.title: Day 10 - Dark matters
item.description: 10th of #Drinktober, and tonight I’m having a Dark Matter coffee porter. Nice beer, kind of chocolatey ! :)

item.title: Day 9 - Oktoberfest
item.description: For the 9th of #Drinktober I’ve got a great big Stein of Oktoberfest Bier which Vikki brought me back from Germany last week. Prost!

item.title: Day 8 - Hot tub (but no time machine)
item.description: The 8th of #Drinktober finds me recovering from an awesome weekend of retro gaming by depeopling in the hot tub with this Beardo IPA and season 5 of Steven Universe :)

item.title: Day 7 - Guinness
item.description: Bit of a quiet one for the 7th of #Drinktober, just chilling out with a pint of Guinness after video gaming all weekend.

item.title: Day 6 - A Thirst for Justice
item.description: For the 6th of #Drinktober, Judge Beerman is quenching his thirst for justice with a pint of Wadworth IPA

item.title: Day 5 - Modelo (and a burrito)
item.description: I’m away for the weekend so starting early for the 5th of #Drinktober with a Modelo and a burrito :)

item.title: Day 4 - Hoptical Illusion
item.description: Strange and mysterious goings on for the 4th of #Drinktober. Am I really drinking this beer, or is it just a… Hoptical Illusion…

item.title: Ghost Dance
item.description: It’s the third of #Drinktober, following up last night’s cowboy beer with this Ghost Dance Chinook Pale Ale, which is rather nice and hoppy :)

item.title: Jesse James IPA
item.description: Howdy there, pardners! For the second of #Drinktober, a quick raid of Aldi’s craft beer section yielded up this cowboy-themed American Pale Ale - seemed only right to dress for the occasion

item.title: Drinktober 2018 Begins!
item.description: Right then, let’s get this show on the road shall we? #Drinktober 2018 starts off nice and easy with some Heineken that was still in the fridge from the weekend.

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Bit of a spooky theme for the 31st of #Drinktober - it’s Drinkoween! Tonight I’m drinking Pumpking - evil pumpkin beer

item.title: Day 30 - Cuba libre
item.description: 30th of #Drinktober - only one more day to go! Cuba Libre tonight, another premixed canned job :)

item.title: Day 20 - Roadcrew
item.description: 20th of #Drinktober, tonight I’ve got a pint of Roadcrew \m/

item.title: Day 29 - Tastes like strawberries
item.description: Not long to go now! 29th of #Drinktober, tonight’s offering is a strawberry daiquiri. Learned my lesson from the Pina colada and beefed it up with a drop of Bacardi :)

item.title: Day 28 - A bit of DnB
item.description: 28th of #Drinktober, and tonight I’ve found this alcoholic dandelion & burdock. It’s not bad :)

item.title: Day 27 - Tell 'em about the honey, Mummy!
item.description: 27th of #Drinktober, tonight I had a honey Jack Daniel’s & lemonade while I was out being crafty in the garage __

item.title: Day 26 - Pimms
item.description: For the 26th of #Drinktober, I finally opened this can of Pimms with blackberry and elderflower that’s been lurking in the fridge for a couple of years now. I’m not entirely sure what Pimms is exactly, but this basically tastes like Ribena.

item.title: Day 25 - This wasn't my best idea
item.description: 25th of #Drinktober, and tonight’s theme is “wow, I’ve got a lot of tequila left. I wonder if it mixes well with this tropical fruit drink?” Narrator : It did not mix well

item.title: Day 24 - Getting caught in the rain
item.description: 24th of #Drinktober - tonight I’ve got some kind of ready-mixed pina colada I found at Sainsbury’s. Very tropical

item.title: Day 23 - Ouzo margarita
item.description: 23rd of #Drinktober - random concoction week continues with this Ouzo margarita. It kind of works :)

item.title: Day 22 - What even is this stuff?
item.description: 22nd of #Drinktober, and we’ve reached the “any old shite that’s in the house” stage ) This is from a box of pre-packaged “flavoured shots” - think this was the apple one. __

item.title: Day 21 - TVR
item.description: Back on a more normal schedule for the 21st of #Drinktober and tonight is a total student classic, the TVR.

item.title: Day 19 - Frankenstein creation
item.description: 19th of #Drinktober and I’m getting inventive tonight. I call this one the Mead-garita. Half margarita mix, half mead - it’s actually pretty good :)

item.title: Day 18 - No sleep...
item.description: 18th of #Drinktober - Brooklyn Lager tonight

item.title: Day 17 - Cactus Jack
item.description: 17th of #Drinktober, and tonight it’s Cactus Jack’s Blackjack flavour schnapps. You probably wouldn’t like this one either :)

item.title: Day 16 - Ouzo
item.description: Ouzo and lemonade tonight for the 16th of #Drinktober - we’re past the halfway mark now, how’s your resolve holding up? :)

item.title: Day 15 - Random
item.description: 15th of #Drinktober and today I’m drinking some random stuff I found at Aldi. “Alizé”, apparently - mix of cognac, vodka and passion fruit. I didn’t even know French vodka was a thing…

item.title: Day 14 - Scuttle left!
item.description: Alcoholic ginger beer for the 14th of #Drinktober.

item.title: Day 13 - Heineken
item.description: Out of town and such with the shockingly expensive and limited hotel bar selection for the 13th of #Drinktober, so it’s just a boring old pint of Heineken this evening. Might have to go find a proper pub…

item.title: Day 12 - More gin!
item.description: #Drinktober the 12th. Gin and pink grapefruit tonight - it’s really rather nice

item.title: Day 11 - Onwards to Valhalla!
item.description: 11th of #Drinktober and I’ve gone all Viking with a horn of mead \m/

item.title: Day 10 - Tequila time!
item.description: It’s the 10th of #Drinktober and tonight I’m having a margarita

item.title: Day 9 - bubbles!
item.description: Drop of cava for the 9th of #Drinktober - bubbleicious!

item.title: Day 8 - Sunshine!
item.description: 8th of #Drinktober and just for a change the daystar showed its face. Seemed like a good opportunity to take this Malibu & pineapple out in the garden and catch a bit of sun

item.title: Day 7 - This one's for Lemmy
item.description: Jack and coke for the 7th of #Drinktober. This one’s dedicated to Lemmy \m/

item.title: Day 6 - Curry night!
item.description: 6th of #Drinktober, and it’s Curry night! So that means chicken vindaloo and frosty Indian lager :)

item.title: Day 5 - Vodka and coke
item.description: It’s the 5th of #Drinktober, and today I’m having vodka and coke.

item.title: Day 4 - Old Rosie
item.description: Drop of cider for the 4th of #Drinktober - cheers!

item.title: Day 3 - Scurvy
item.description: For the 3rd of #Drinktober, I’ve got a bit of a pirate theme going, with Captain Morgan and coke. Yarr!

item.title: Day 2 - Gin o'Clock
item.description: 2nd of #Drinktober. Gin o’Clock :)

item.title: Day 1 - It begins!
item.description: #Drinktober begins with a nice pint of fine Ruby ale. Mmm, lovely…
